A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This is one of the worst Star Wars movies ever made. If you removed Jar Jar\, the prequels would have been better than The Last Jedi. This movie completely breaks continuity with Force Awakens so many times it makes me sick. There are unnecessary subplots\, forced love interests\, and it's very heavy handed for merchandising and not subtle about it. It shoves social justice crusades down the viewers throats.
